svg.title: West Coast Main Line rail service pattern diagram in public domain

g.title: Virgin Trains: Glasgow Central to London Euston
Virgin Trains: Glasgow Central or Edinburgh Waverley to London Euston via Birmingham New Street
Virgin Trains: Liverpool Lime Street to London Euston
Virgin Trains: Certain trains from London continues towards Holyhead beyond Chester
Virgin Trains: Chester to London Euston
Virgin Trains: Manchester Piccadilly to London Euston (via Crewe and Wilmslow)
Virgin Trains: Manchester Piccadilly to London Euston (via Stoke-on-Trent and Milton Keynes Central)
Virgin Trains: Manchester Piccadilly to London Euston (via Stoke-on-Trent and Macclesfield)
Virgin Trains: Birmingham New Street to London Euston (via Rugby)
Virgin Trains: Birmingham New Street to London Euston (via Milton Keynes Central)
First TransPennine Express: Glasgow Central or Edinburgh Waverley to Manchester Airport
First TransPennine Express: Glasgow Central or Edinburgh Waverley to Manchester Airport via Chorley and Bolton (limited service)

use.title: First TransPennine Express: Glasgow Central or Edinburgh Waverley to Manchester Airport via Chorley and Bolton (limited service)

g.title: London Midland Express: Liverpool Lime Street to Birmingham New Street (via Acton Bridge, Smethwick Galton Bridge, etc.)
London Midland Express: Liverpool Lime Street to Birmingham New Street (via Penkridge and Coseley)
London Midland Express: Crewe to London Euston
London Midland Express: Birmingham New Street to London Euston
London Midland Express: Northampton to London Euston
London Midland Express: Milton Keynes Central to London Euston
London Midland Express: Tring to London Euston (1)
London Midland Express: Tring to London Euston (2)
